ghcr.io/wxw-matt/devcontainer-features/c.command2: pwd && cd medperf && pip install -e ./cli && pip install -r server/requirements.txt && pip install -r server/test-requirements.txt
ghcr.io/wxw-matt/devcontainer-features/c.command4: pwd && cd server && cp .env.local.local-auth .env && medperf auth login -e testmo@example.com && cd ..
